p: What a thrill is was for me to see you again after so many years. Your appearance on the Dick Cavett Show was a sincere pleasure.

I attended the University of Missouri form 1954-1958. The absolute highlight of my entire college career was the semester (spring '58) I took your course, "Epoch America." I treasure your inscription in my copy of Cycle of the West.
For many years I taught fifth grade. I never missed a year of reading some of your work to my students.
